ai-kv4.7:9.1_0: Just as the Buddha-to-be was born, the being intent on awakening stands firm with his own feet on the ground.
ai-kv4.7:9.2_0: “I am the foremost in the world! I am the eldest in the world! I am the foremost in this world! I am the eldest in the world! I am the first in the world! I am the eldest in the world! I am the eldest in the world! I am the first in the world! This is my last rebirth.”

ai-kv4.7:13.5_0: “Mendicants, a great man who possesses these two possible destinies, no other.
ai-kv4.7:13.6_0: If he stays at home he becomes a king, a wheel-turning monarch.
ai-kv4.7:13.7_0: He has the following seven treasures:
ai-kv4.7:13.8_0: the wheel, the elephant, the horse, the jewel, the woman, the treasurer, and the counselor as the seventh treasure.
ai-kv4.7:13.9_0: He has over a thousand sons who are valiant and heroic, crushing the armies of his enemies.
ai-kv4.7:13.10_0: After conquering this land girt by sea, he reigns by principle, without rod or sword.
ai-kv4.7:13.11_0: But if he goes forth from the lay life to homelessness, he becomes a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha, who draws back the veil from the world.”
ai-kv4.7:13.14_0: So the Buddha-to-be possessed the characteristic of Awakening.
ai-kv4.7:13.15_0: The story of the characteristics is finished.
